articles.description: The US news landscape is currently marked by significant events, including the resignation of Trump prosecutor Jack Smith, wildfires in Los Angeles claiming lives, TikTok legal battles, and Biden administration's international negotiations. In addition, artist Sharon Sprung is painting Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen's portrait.
